physical_examinations.relevant_findings: History of high-frequency hearing loss; tinnitus; declining hearing documented from 1986 to 1995.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Hearing continued to decline with severe bilateral sensorineural hearing loss noted over time; marked decline in hearing reported in the following months.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Developed deep venous thrombosis leading to change in antiretroviral therapy.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Overall progression of hearing loss evident with fluctuations in audiology testing over the next 2 years.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Reported stable, mild hearing loss and tinnitus since 1966; audiologic testing revealed moderately severe bilateral hearing loss.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Severe tinnitus developed along with deterioration of hearing noted.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Simultaneous onset of burning pain in feet and severe tinnitus.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Peripheral neuropathy and tinnitus improved upon stopping antiretroviral medications.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Neuropathy and tinnitus worsened after resuming antiretroviral therapy.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: No significant progression in severe hearing loss noted over past 2 years based on audiology testing.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: History of stable hearing loss in left ear since early 1970s.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: New onset of tinnitus and worsening hearing noted approximately 4 months after starting antiretroviral therapy; slight improvement after changing medications.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Mild hearing loss in right ear and moderately severe in left ear.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Unchanged hearing loss documented during a 2-month assessment period.
